meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of triglyphs.
meanings.sent1: The triglyphical design on the ancient temple was simple and neat.
meanings.sent2: The architect chose a triglyphical pattern for the frieze to match the classical style.
meanings.sent3: The triglyphical decorations on the building made it look like a miniature Greek temple.
meanings.sent4: Her dress had a triglyphical border that added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent5: The triglyphical details on the columns stood out against the plain walls.

meanings.sent1: The artist created a triglyphical sculpture that mimicked the ancient designs.
meanings.sent2: The new building featured a triglyphical facade that paid homage to classical architecture.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with a triglyphical pattern made of frosting.
meanings.sent4: The garden pathway had a triglyphical border made of small stones.
meanings.sent5: The triglyphical carvings on the wooden door added a touch of tradition.
